column5: thinking of hitting the niagara for steelhead this friday can anyone let me know what the conditions are like?  thanks alot   dobee ps: if anyone wants to go on friday pm me
Are you serious? The river is a mud slide.
she is starting to clear abit...it might be fishable by friday.  That si a might but only about 1-2 feet visibility by then providing we get no more winds that is
any update on the river conditions?  thanks
thanks for the link danbo, would anyone here be able to pm me directions to the whirlpool? never been before, first time. any help would be appreciated thanks!
